email.text:
With our photos now out, we have one thing to ask from you which we didn't mention in our last email: **feedback for IC Hack 19**!
We carefully go through every point of feedback we receive. Your feedback will shape the organisation and running of IC Hack 20, so if you could spare a few minutes filling out our feedback form, we'd really appreciate it!
**Submit feedback here**: https://goo.gl/forms/ujON8LInBNiMsQDr1

We look forward to seeing you next year for **IC Hack 20**!
_- The IC Hack 19 team_
